trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There was one other sighting in Toronto on or around July 12th 2013
Summary: Bright blue light moving in a straight line at high speed
divs: Sighting DetailsWe just briefly caught a glimpse of a bright blue light moving very quickly Northward in the general vicinity of Downsview Airport. Straight line path, faster and brighter than an airplane or helicopter. Do discernable features, just a large blue light, like a star. Witnessed by myself, my wife and daughter. We lost sight of the object behind some trees, then went and ate hamburgers.
